TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 將 URL 區段的值繫結至參數物件。

span.span: Binds the value of a URL segment to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您實作 ASP.NET 路由的網站中，您可以使用的要求的 URL 區段的值繫結至資料庫查詢或命令的物件。If you implement ASP.NET routing in a Web site, you can use the object to bind the value of a segment of the requested URL to a database query or command. 您可以宣告物件在標記中的資料來源控制項或控制項。You can declare objects in markup for data source controls or the control. 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web site 專案位於：[下載](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168640)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168640). ## Examples 在本節中的範例示範如何使用標記將 URL 參數值傳遞至所指定資料的查詢中的物件原始檔控制。The examples in this section show how to use objects in markup to pass URL parameter values to a query that is specified for a data source control. 下列範例顯示程式碼中定義的路由，名為 Global.asax 頁面`ProductRoute`。The following example shows code in the Global.asax page that defines a route that is named `ProductRoute`. 路由會定義名為 URL 參數`productname`。The route defines a URL parameter that is named `productname`. 路由也會定義名為選擇性雜物箱參數`culture`，可用來指定顯示的產品描述的語言。The route also defines an optional catchall parameter that is named `culture`, which can be used to specify the language in which the product description is displayed. Product.aspx 頁面會處理此路由的要求。The Product.aspx page handles requests for this route. 下列範例顯示 Product.aspx 頁面。The following example shows the Product.aspx page. 此頁面包含控制項，其需要兩個參數，一個用於產品的名稱和其中一個語言的產品描述的查詢。The page contains a control that has a query that requires two parameters, one for the name of the product and one for the language of the product description. 物件用來提供查詢參數的值。 objects are used to supply the values for the query parameters. 路由的 URL 參數的值`productname`傳遞至查詢參數`@productname`。The value of the route URL parameter `productname` is passed to the query parameter `@productname`. 路由的 URL 參數的值`culture`傳遞至查詢參數`@culture`。The value of the route URL parameter `culture` is passed to the query parameter `@culture`. 如果路由的 URL 不包含 URL 參數`culture`，使用預設值是"en"。If a route URL does not include the URL parameter `culture`, a default value of "en" is used. 下列範例顯示名為 ProductLinks.aspx，其中包含連結至 Product.aspx 頁面中，使用路由 Url 的超連結的頁面。The following example shows a page that is named ProductLinks.aspx, which contains hyperlinks that link to the Product.aspx page by using route URLs. 這些超連結使用`RouteUrl`運算式，以建立路由的 Url。These hyperlinks use `RouteUrl` expressions to create route URLs. 第一個連結不包含`culture`路由參數。The first link does not include a `culture` route parameter. 因此，"en"中所定義的預設值物件`@culture`會在查詢中使用查詢參數。Therefore, the default value of "en" that is defined in the object for `@culture` query parameter will be used in the query. 第二個連結提供`culture`值為"fr"，這會導致要以法文顯示的描述。The second link provides a `culture` value of "fr", which causes the description to be displayed in French. 如需有關如何使用`RouteUrl`運算式，請參閱[如何： 建構的 Url，從路由](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ffd4085-71f6-4822-be8f-f682ca638650)。For more information about how to use `RouteUrl` expressions, see [How to: Construct URLs from Routes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ffd4085-71f6-4822-be8f-f682ca638650). 當您按一下第一個超連結時，您會看到 Product.aspx 頁面中的下列值控制項：When you click the first hyperlink, you see the Product.aspx page with the following values in the control: |ProductIDProductID|名稱Name|描述Description| |---------------|----------|-----------------| |`994`|`LL Bottom Bracket`|`Chromoly steel.`| 當您按一下第二個超連結時，請參閱中的下列值控制項：When you click the second hyperlink, you see the following values in the control: |ProductIDProductID|名稱Name|描述Description| |---------------|----------|-----------------| |`994`|`LL Bottom Bracket`|`Acier chromé.`| 若要執行此範例中，加入兩個.aspx 頁面和程式碼在 Global.asax 檔案中定義名為連接字串的 ASP.NET 網站或 Web 應用程式`AdventureWorksLTConnectionString`AdventureWorksLT 資料庫。To run this example, add the two .aspx pages and the code in the Global.asax file to an ASP.NET Web site or Web application that defines a connection string named `AdventureWorksLTConnectionString` for the AdventureWorksLT database. 如需如何設定 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的連接資訊，請參閱[如何： 設定 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫的 ASP.NET 開發](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。For information about how to set up a connection to the AdventureWorksLT database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356). 如需有關 ASP.NET 路由的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 路由](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).

summary.span: 取得或設定要從其中擷取路由參數值的路由區段名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the route segment from which to retrieve the value for the route parameter.

value.span: 包含參數值的路由區段名稱。

span.span: The name of the route segment that contains the value for the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您定義的路由模式時，您可以包含做為 Web 要求 URL 中的實際值的預留位置的區段。When you define a route pattern, you can include segments that serve as placeholders for the actual values in the Web request URL. 您定義在括號括住的預留位置 (`{`和`}`)。You define placeholders by enclosing them in braces ( `{` and `}` ). 例如，路由模式格式`blog/{action}/{entry}`包含名為的預留位置`action`和`entry`。For example, a route pattern in the format `blog/{action}/{entry}` contains placeholders named `action` and `entry`. 若要擷取的預留位置值，設定屬性設為名稱的預留位置並呼叫方法。To retrieve the value of a placeholder, set the property to the name of the placeholder and call the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Routing
